title: ST_KNN
description: Return true if geomA finds k nearest neighbors from geomB.
kernels:
  - returns: boolean
    args:
    - geometry
    - geometry
    - name: k
      type: integer
    - name: use_spheroid
      type: boolean
---

## Examples

```sql
WITH table2 AS (
    SELECT geom1 FROM (VALUES
        (ST_Point(0, 1)),
        (ST_Point(2, 3)),
        (ST_Point(4, 5)),
        (ST_Point(6, 7)),
        (ST_Point(8, 9))
    ) AS t(geom1)
),
table1 AS (
    SELECT ST_Point(0, 0) AS geom2
)
SELECT * FROM table1 JOIN table2 ON ST_KNN(geom1, geom2, 3, false);
```
